text: Anomaloglossus meansi is a frog. Scientists found it in Guyana. ==Body== The adult male frog is 18.86 mm long from nose to rear end and the adult female frog is 21.26 mm long. There is a thin stripe on each side of the body from the nose to the rear end. ==Home== This frog lives on cloud forests on tepui flatlands. Scientists saw it between 1234 and 1490 meters above sea level on tepui Ayanganna and tepui Wokomung. It lives near streams. ==Danger== Scientists do not know if this frog is in danger of dying out. ==References== Category:Frogs of South America
title: Anomaloglossus meansi
